alert.note: Alert for Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 3:52PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect Kennebec...northwestern Waldo...north central Androscoggin...southeastern Somerset and southeastern Franklin Counties... At 352 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from 7 miles northeast of Madison to near Jay...and moving southeast AT 45 MPH. Locations impacted include... Augusta, Waterville, Farmington, Fairfield, Gardiner, Oakland, Skowhegan, Pittsfield, Thorndike, Madison, Jay, China, Clinton, Belgrade, Livermore Falls, Farmingdale, Manchester, Hallowell, Liberty and Palermo. This includes Interstate 95 between mile markers 105 and 157. * Winds in excess of 35 mph are possible with this area of heavy snow showers. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roads then quickly refreezes. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Androscoggin; Interior Waldo; Kennebec; Knox; Lincoln; Southern Franklin; Southern Oxford; Southern Somerset
